Separated Soul:
The claw of Antharas barely touched my face, but my soul was still ripped apart!
Now I can't gather the scattered souls in the area, but I can sense them. If you want, I can send you to where my souls are located.
Also, using the Will of Antharas that you have, I can also break the Sealed Blood Crystal. How about it?
